subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees designated outfielder Bronson Sardinha for assignment, clearing room on the 40-man roster for Andy Pettitte. The Yankees have 10 days to trade orrelease Sardinha, or send him to the minors.
snippet: The Yankees designated outfielder Bronson Sardinha for assignment, clearing room on the 40-man roster for Andy Pettitte. The Yankees have 10 days to trade orrelease Sardinha, or send him to the minors.
